## Description {#details}

Represents a <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/goff">GOFF</a> physical record.

Specifies protected member functions to manipulate the record. These should be called from deriving classes to change values as that record specifies.

Definition at line 31 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/goff-h">GOFF.h</a>.

### getBits() {#a621bf457e53725ae30708875b8d33bec}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void llvm::object::Record::getBits (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> uint8&#95;t &#42; Bytes, uint8&#95;t ByteIndex, uint8&#95;t BitIndex, uint8&#95;t Length, uint8&#95;t &amp; Value)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "protected", "static"]}>
Get bit field of specified byte.

Used to pack bit fields into one byte. Fields are packed left to right. Bit index zero is the most significant bit of the byte.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="ByteIndex">index of byte the field is in.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="BitIndex">index of first bit of field.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Length">length of bit field.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/classes/llvm/value&quot;>Value</a>">value of bit field.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/goff-h/#l00058">58</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/goff-h">GOFF.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
